channel.title: Eternal Flame [317] PI based, Dungeoneering Gear!, ~Hiring Minimum Staff~PICS!
channel.description:
! Staff Requirement's ! 1. Be active and online atleast an hour per day 2. Dont abuse powers 3. Be active on forums 4. Respectful to players 5. Have an account atleast a week old on the server 6. As a staff member you have each staff members trust, don't take advantage of that. 7. Don't bullshit Flame 8. Professionalism is a must. 9. Grammar 10. A way of contact as in, MSN\Skype\Yahoo. Must have atleast one of those.. 11. Activity on Forums. 12. Chatbox Activity. ------------------------------------------------------------ ::: :::Positions available::: ::: -----------------------------------Owner 1/1----------------------------- -----------------------------------Co-owner 1/1----------------------- -----------------------------------Head Admin's 0\1-------------------- -----------------------------------Admin's 0/2---------------------- -----------------------------------Head Mod 0/1--------------------- -----------------------------------Mod's 1/2--------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Note:Must have a week of activity BEFORE applying, Application's will be declined immediatley without the week of activity. Thank's :)
[b]How to apply![/b] You can Post an application at the forums www.eternalflame.freeforums.org Add the owner to compelete the the process once done making an app - Mt12094@hotmail.com Thank's!!!
Enjoy? :P.... Details\Info: ---------------------- -Vote system where you can earn vote Levels + points to spend on dungeoneering gear like Torva :) -Added Primal and all the other dungeoneering gear. (So many of them) -Custom Dungeoneering dungeon's + custom shops -Animated Frost Dragons 100% -Used James guide for in game highscores(had to edit it a little bit cause it was still giving errors) -Slayer Helm assembly -Added slayer points and made them gainable -Clipped Firemaking [b]-Added a Dungeoneering base + Tokens\Custom level interface + gear[/b] -Added a bankpin system -Ripped the event system from Project Fatality (Being honest haha :P) -Attempted to fix pest control(602 npc make the portals respawn I suggest just add new a new minigame) -Worked on player clipping a little as well -a nice ::stafflist, ::home, ::corp, and a couple of other commands. Hand Cannon Full morrigan javelins and throwing axes Coinshare Full Skill cape emotes! Real turmoil! New 602 animation and gfx’s Correct spirit shield bonuses and EFFECTS! Clue Scrolls!! Full Slayer Point System 60+ People on at all times Crystal Key chest have the chance to get 3rd age and rares New OverLoads Pots Full working chaotic weapons Full Godwars Turmoil! Working LootShare Full functioning Clan Chat Working obelisk teleporters Kbd Dagganoths All inboune rings ex berserker ring(i) Full weapon specials and emotes Full autocasting Constant Updates Arcane Stream necklaces All Spirit Shields Full weapon specials and emotes Pvp armours Full Pvp weapons specials correct emotes Shops There is training but you can start off by doing :ure ! Full Pvp weapons specials correct emotes Perfect Hybriding Open Staff Slots Running on dedicated NO Lag 24/7 Full Skilling for the Non pkers Fight pits Full dueling with staking Full pest control ******************* Media: [IMG]http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac208/van_quyt46/coollogo_com_322201970.gif[/img]
Primal Maul!

Hope you enjoyed :) [b][size=12pt](This server is a Baby server and is just starting out, I'd say the server is around 90% Compelete.)[/size][/b] ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Website - www.eternalflame.freeforums.org Owner MSN - mt12094@hotmail.com Co-Owner MSN - hail_headshot@live.com Client is on Forums.... Chatbox - http://xat.com/EternalFlameOffical Staff will be in chatbox everyday.
Hope you enjoyed, now leave a dirty 'lil Comment below :)
Sincerly,
Flame

item.title: Eternal Flame [317] PI based, Dungeoneering Gear!, ~Hiring Minimum Staff~PICS!
item.dc:creator: @scatt567 scatt567
item.description:
@scatt567 wrote:

! Staff Requirement’s !

  1. Be active and online atleast an hour per day (I can do that in the summer. I’ll try during school.
  2. Dont abuse powers (I’m not. I have been staff on rsps 2 times… Yes I know i’m a noob but I can do that.)
  3. Be active on forums (Ok)
  4. Respectful to players (Ok)
  5. Have an account atleast a week old on the server (Ok)
  6. As a staff member you have each staff members trust, don’t take advantage of that. (Ok)
  7. Don’t bullshit Flame (Ok)
  8. Professionalism is a must. (Ok :P)
  9. Grammar (Easy for me.)
  10. A way of contact as in, MSN\Skype\Yahoo. Must have atleast one of those… (Skype: Chamapolica.foxx)
  11. Activity on Forums. (Ok)
  12. Chatbox Activity. (Ok)

Read full topic

item.title: Eternal Flame [317] PI based, Dungeoneering Gear!, ~Hiring Minimum Staff~PICS!
item.dc:creator: @flame255 flame255
item.description:
@flame255 wrote:

Btw, if you want to test out the server it’s 24/7 I forgot to mention in the post

24/7 No lagg
No rollbacks (You can even “save” your character in-game just incase)
Downtime only when adding things to server.
Runs the server on a laptop with 4gb ram, and codes the server on a computer with 8gb of ram.
YOU can get the client at forums www.eternalflame.freeforums.org
Try it out, Right now were (Noname and I) are changing home + shops and different interfaces.
Click the Client link on forums for the client (just so you know :))

Thank’s for your Dirty 'lil comment’s!!

Sincerly,

Flame

item.title: Eternal Flame [317] PI based, Dungeoneering Gear!, ~Hiring Minimum Staff~PICS!
item.dc:creator: @flame255 flame255
item.description:
@flame255 wrote:

[quote=“hawkgames, post:13, topic:405620”][quote author=flame255 link=topic=502614.msg3678245#msg3678245 date=1311365048]

Too much staff…

Too much?, haha. I’m not gonna run a small server, i’m sticking with this server. Plus, Most staff arent on at the same time, Considering the fact of Head admin\mod’s, They hire their own team’s. For one the point of having Head admin\mod is because it makes my job a bit easier so I for one don’t have to hire mods\admins, only head admins\mod’s. Really as me being an owner, I don’t want to worry about staff abusing\breaking rules. Which is why i hired each group their own boss.
That’s why it look’s like there’s alot of staff, Right now I don’t need much staff only like 2 - 3 more… I hire more as the server grows and expand’s.
Thank’s…
[/quote]

Bad idea, won’t go anywhere with those forums and this is probably a leech.[/quote]

How is this a leech ???, I made a custom source, and just ripped and filled in blanks from other sources. I only ripped a couple things.
Plus those are temp forums so yeah thanks for the dirty 'lil comment… ROFL, L2read.

Read full topic

item.description:
@flame255 wrote:

Nonamee:

Great job Flame.

Thank’s

[quote=“Ljelvin1995, post:3, topic:405620”]Hey,
Your requirments are, and here what i could do for head admin :-)…

! Staff Requirement’s !

  1. Be active and online atleast an hour per day - I COULD DO ABOUT 5 HOURS EVERYDAY
  2. Dont abuse powers - I WONT
  3. Be active on forums - I WILL, EVERYDAY
  4. Respectful to players - I AM WELL MANORED, AND ALWAYS WILLING TO HELP
  5. Have an account atleast a week old on the server - I DONT ATM, SORRY BUT ILL JOIN?
  6. As a staff member you have each staff members trust, don’t take advantage of that. - I WONT…
  7. Don’t bullshit Flame - I WONT
  8. Professionalism is a must. - I HAVE HAD 3 RSPS IN THE PAST, I AM A PROFESSIONAL JAVA, HTML AND PHP CODER
  9. Grammar - YES
  10. A way of contact as in, MSN\Skype\Yahoo. Must have atleast one of those… -MSN
  11. Activity on Forums. -I WILL
  12. Chatbox Activity. -OF COURSE…

HOPE TO HEAR FROM YOU SOON BUDDY

o yes, and i could make you a professional website too
Lee[/quote]

Mmk, Very nice… I’ll talk to you on MSN

item.title: Eternal Flame [317] PI based, Dungeoneering Gear!, ~Hiring Minimum Staff~PICS!
item.dc:creator: @Ljelvin1995 Ljelvin1995
item.description:
@Ljelvin1995 wrote:

Hey,
Your requirments are, and here what i could do for head admin :-)…

! Staff Requirement’s !

  1. Be active and online atleast an hour per day - I COULD DO ABOUT 5 HOURS EVERYDAY
  2. Dont abuse powers - I WONT
  3. Be active on forums - I WILL, EVERYDAY
  4. Respectful to players - I AM WELL MANORED, AND ALWAYS WILLING TO HELP
  5. Have an account atleast a week old on the server - I DONT ATM, SORRY BUT ILL JOIN?
  6. As a staff member you have each staff members trust, don’t take advantage of that. - I WONT…
  7. Don’t bullshit Flame - I WONT
  8. Professionalism is a must. - I HAVE HAD 3 RSPS IN THE PAST, I AM A PROFESSIONAL JAVA, HTML AND PHP CODER
  9. Grammar - YES
  10. A way of contact as in, MSN\Skype\Yahoo. Must have atleast one of those… -MSN
  11. Activity on Forums. -I WILL
  12. Chatbox Activity. -OF COURSE…

HOPE TO HEAR FROM YOU SOON BUDDY

o yes, and i could make you a professional website too
Lee

Read full topic

item.title: Eternal Flame [317] PI based, Dungeoneering Gear!, ~Hiring Minimum Staff~PICS!
item.dc:creator: @flame255 flame255
item.description:
@flame255 wrote:

! Staff Requirement’s !

  1. Be active and online atleast an hour per day
  2. Dont abuse powers
  3. Be active on forums
  4. Respectful to players
  5. Have an account atleast a week old on the server
  6. As a staff member you have each staff members trust, don’t take advantage of that.
  7. Don’t bullshit Flame
  8. Professionalism is a must.
  9. Grammar
  10. A way of contact as in, MSN\Skype\Yahoo. Must have atleast one of those…
  11. Activity on Forums.
  12. Chatbox Activity.

::: :::Positions available::: :::
-----------------------------------Owner 1/1-----------------------------
-----------------------------------Co-owner 1/1-----------------------
-----------------------------------Head Admin’s 0\1--------------------
-----------------------------------Admin’s 0/2----------------------
-----------------------------------Head Mod 0/1---------------------
-----------------------------------Mod’s 1/2---------------------------

Note:Must have a week of activity BEFORE applying, Application’s will be declined immediatley without the week of activity. Thank’s 

  [b]How to apply![/b]

You can Post an application at the forums www.eternalflame.freeforums.org
Add the owner to compelete the the process once done making an app - Mt12094@hotmail.com
Thank’s!!!

Enjoy? :P…
Details\Info:

-Vote system where you can earn vote Levels + points to spend on dungeoneering gear like Torva
-Added Primal and all the other dungeoneering gear. (So many of them)
-Custom Dungeoneering dungeon’s + custom shops
-Animated Frost Dragons 100%
-Used James guide for in game highscores(had to edit it a little bit cause it was still giving errors)
-Slayer Helm assembly
-Added slayer points and made them gainable
-Clipped Firemaking
-Added a Dungeoneering base + Tokens\Custom level interface + gear
-Added a bankpin system
-Ripped the event system from Project Fatality (Being honest haha :P)
-Attempted to fix pest control(602 npc make the portals respawn I suggest just add new a new minigame)
-Worked on player clipping a little as well
-a nice ::stafflist, ::home, ::corp, and a couple of other commands.
Hand Cannon
Full morrigan javelins and throwing axes
Coinshare
Full Skill cape emotes!
Real turmoil!
New 602 animation and gfx’s
Correct spirit shield bonuses and EFFECTS!
Clue Scrolls!!
Full Slayer Point System
60+ People on at all times
Crystal Key chest have the chance to get 3rd age and rares
New OverLoads Pots
Full working chaotic weapons
Full Godwars
Turmoil!
Working LootShare
Full functioning Clan Chat
Working obelisk teleporters
Kbd
Dagganoths
All inboune rings ex berserker ring(i)
Full weapon specials and emotes
Full autocasting
Constant Updates
Arcane Stream necklaces
All Spirit Shields
Full weapon specials and emotes
Pvp armours
Full Pvp weapons specials correct emotes
Shops
There is training but you can start off by doing :ure !
Full Pvp weapons specials correct emotes
Perfect Hybriding
Open Staff Slots
Running on dedicated NO Lag 24/7
Full Skilling for the Non pkers
Fight pits
Full dueling with staking
Full pest control
